Dream Beans

l8«d laG;

u|flkms l8hfOg
Graphics Design

Project details

kl/of]hgf lj:tf/df

Description
ljj/0f

It was a pleasure working with Dream Beans Restaurant and Bakery. This project is one of my best graphics design projects; I re-designed their logo; designed business card, hoarding board design, brochure menu, menu and social media posts, some of which you can see above. It's got nice color combinations and beautiful designs.

Dream Beans Restaurant and Bakery is a perfect place for you inside Kathmandu valley, located in Chapagaun, Lalitpur, if you are looking for some good food and cozy environment. They also have delicious bakery items available if you're a sweet tooth.
